contextId.information: This is an exaggeration used to show the extra effort Israel made to meet Pharaoh's demands. AT: "a wide area" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
The word "all" here is an exaggeration to emphasize how serious the problem was. AT: "Many of the Egyptians" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
This is exaggerated to emphasize the seriousness of the event. AT: "a large number of the cattle of Egypt died" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: all the cattle of Egypt died
